description: jLight Pro is a full-featured flashlight app that allows you to save up to 8 of your favorite flashlight settings.  Select your preferences and then save them with any name you like.  Once saved, you can alternate between your presets with a simple tap on the app menu.  Set up strobe lights, an SOS, Morse-code operation, your favorite colors, and have them all at your fingertips instantly any time you start the app.  Presets can be updated or deleted as needed.  Settings include a variety of colors, patterns, and tap functions.  Solid light, adjustable flashing strobe, and SOS are all included.  Tap out morse code with the 'LightOn' tap function, or, when not using a preset, use 'ChangeColor' to cycle through a variety of colors just by tapping the screen.  jLight Pro can be used with or without presets. Simply choose your settings and return to the main screen without saving.  Jump back to your presets at any time with a tap on the menu.  Check out the Hints on the Instructions page to get you started. Download and enjoy!
